channel.title: Troubleshooting on Duende IdentityServer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on Duende IdentityServer Documentation

item.title: Microsoft.IdentityModel.* versions
item.description: Duende IdentityServer, the Microsoft external authentication handlers and other libraries all use the Microsoft.IdentityModel set of libraries. These libraries provides token and configuration handling features. The functionality is split up between different libraries and they all need to be exactly the same version. However this is not enfored by Nuget so it is common to end up with an application that brings in different versions of Microsoft.IdentityModel.* through transitive dependencies.
